quote_first: The front door opens. Her heart pounds. She looks at the time on the bottom right of her screen.
title: The Woman Downstairs
author: Elisabeth Carpenter

quote_last: I’m doing fine. I’m doing well. I’ve got the Hoover on, I’m cruising along nicely- What was that? What just went up the Hoover? Why is it making that grinding noise? Have I broken it?
title: The Undomestic Goddess
author: Sophie Kinsella
